thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Reacts to Beyonce's Grammy Performance - Motto
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Reacts to Beyonce's Grammy Performance - Motto

title: Chrissy Teigen Reacts to Beyonce's Grammy Performance - Motto
text:
She did not play it cool Watch Next Pause & Collapse Video Adele may have swept the top three awards at last night’s Grammys , but there’s no doubt that the show was all about Beyoncé . E ven Adele wanted her to win . A very pregnant Queen B ey , who was nominated in the three categories that Adele won, dazzled the crowd with an electrifying nine-minute performance that included renditions of “Love Drought” and “Sandcastle” and featured the words of the poet Warsan Shire. Beyoncé’s set was so mesmerizing that a number of celebrities couldn’t contain their excitement , including Chrissy Teigen, who took to Twitter to express her love for the singer in a series of exuberant posts. “I am crying. My bey. I cannot breathe,” read her first tweet, soon followed by the single word: “Dead.” Teigen then uploaded a picture of Beyoncé mid-performance, before concluding her social media stream with a weepy-looking selfie with husband John Legend and Jason Derulo, which she captioned : “Goodbye.” I am crying. My bey. I cannot breathe 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 Dead
